content: description the ski time pullover is the sister pattern to the teatime cardigan this is the perfect pullover to toss on whether you re hitting the slopes or staying cozy by the fire it features a fun stitch pattern and a slouchy fit this pattern free on my blog 1 this pattern is available as a kit with lion brand 2 the kit comes with all the yarn you need to make your own sweater you can even customize your yarn color you will receive a complimentary copy of the pdf pattern 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-ski-time-pullover-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/3tzd0
